If you're a montreal buff, you'll love this movie, the majority of the battle scenes are shot in the olympic stadium and outside of it which is where the expos used to play. Also the montreal skyline is displayed very well of course with some cgi added to make it a movie and also the airport in which M lives is the abandoned airport somewhere right outside of montreal. That's the only real reason I enjoyed it, Montreal baby, it's the best.
